title: Customer experience - Mantra To Success  | Venky Vijay Reddi | TEDxFMS
description: In his speech he will talk about the how customer experience has gained importance over all the  other services offered and is one of core differentiators between the organisations. He will take the audience through his own personal experiences and then illustrating 5 habits of consumer obsessed companies. He is focusing the shift in the perspectives and strategies by the companies and how being customer driven has led many companies to success
author: Venky Vijay Reddi
